I am a mage. I sell runes to my customers.
Rooster is not my name, but my nickname. In fact, I don't know my real name. My parents never told me.
Celeres is where I live.
Zertic... isn't it that grand mage from Casteldine everyone is talking about?
Magic is an amazing art, and I wish to never stop performing it.
I have no spells that I can teach. I know as a matter of fact that there exists certain spell scrolls which teaches its possessor magic. But this magic is not good. It's dark magic.
I can offer you various runes, everything from defensive to offensive.
Pire Vam is no match for me. I have countless runes and spells at my disposal.
I don't know the sheriff, but he seems to know me.
Natalon saved Casteldine from destruction.
Lithaton is named after some guy named Lith, or something. I read it in Casteldine a long time ago.
Hail the king!
As a true mage my neverending quest is to search for the true secret of magic.
There are many mages around, but not many as good as I am.
I know Casteldine. I've been there.
The secrets of magic... is it dark magic?

Have you heard of the scrolls... the spell scrolls? It teaches dark magic, although one may be imprisoned for talking about it. I have had a special permission to mention it from the sheriff, so I can tell everyone that the subject is taboo.
Dark magic is taboo here in Celeres. Only I and the sheriff are allowed to mention it. You shouldn't, you might end up in trouble.
The Celerian Academy is apparently some mystic party, whose intentions are to rule the city of Celeres in secrecy.
Didn't he live here while ago?
I think he was the friend of Ventus.
That's where I get the fabric for my clothes.
Hercules is the one providing me with the fabric for my clothes.
Andrew is a simple boozer. I bet he'll die soon enough.
Steve is very lazy. I wonder if he has ever even had a job.
Stephanie is elegant, but she appears to have too little money to buy my fashion clothes.
Sigiric is old. Old as this land, probably.
He is a simple thief.
My clothes are top fashion.
I buy spools of yarn from Caroline. She makes them out of giant spider silk, she told me. They are of decent quality.
